name: Juicy Snake
description:
A juicy snake clone. Created for the Juice Jam II.

Trapping yourself is not yet handled! Apologies! If you corner yourself you can restart with ESC and then Return To Menu to start over.

Steer with WASD, slow down time by holding Shift. Scroll the mouse or up/down on arrow keys to zoom in/out.

This is still a bit buggy and needs quite a bit more to be playable. Still, happy to have participated and happy to share the Work-In-Progress.
